lines.text:
[they see Michael]
Look, Biff, there he is. How about an autograph?
Will you autograph my tummy? What's the matter, you got no pen?
Let's get him.
[they chase Michael]

[pinning Katie down with his foot, after beating up Michael, to a guard]
Kill her first!
Michael!

[to Katie]
Shut up!

[screaming]
LEAVE HER ALONE!
[spotlights shatter as his voice echos]
My name is gonna be in the history books. And they better spell my name right! L-I-D-E-O. So simple. Frankie LiDeo! Very easy!
Remember, a younger customer always turns into a loyal customer. Remember that! Remember that!
Why are you doing this? Stop it!
You wanna know why I'm doing this, do you? I just wanna get everybody high, Man. You know, some good drugs. That's all.
Do it and you're dead.
Let's give her a shot of this.

[when Michael accidentally runs in on his set]
Cut! You hairball, I'll never finish this movie! Who let him in? Isn't anybody in charge? Don't you know ANYTHING about show business?
I'm sorry.
My producer is doing this to me, isn't he? I ask for a BAD guy and he gives me Michael Jackson? I can't take it anymore!
Hey, pilgrim, you wanna ruin my career, I'LL show you *bad*.
Sorry, I gotta go. Bye.
Let's get the varmit.
Land of the free, home of the weird.
What is he wearing?
A Prince t-shirt and red sneakers.
*Prince* t-shirt?

[a traffic cop points to a "No Moonwalking" sign]
Me and my friend, Spike, we were just... But, my friend, he was just... Spike, he was just here...

[Hands him a ticket pad]
I need your autograph right HERE.

[about Michael Jackson]
I taught him everything he knows.

You guys gotta get in the middle of the country. Get in the middle of the country there! Stop those kids from praying in school. First, I want you to hang around by playgrounds, I want you to hang around schoolyards.
I want every kid in this whole world to take drugs because of me. Because of ME. I want everybody to know. Everybody.
Let her go!
Shut up! Don't you talk to me. You shut up!
Do it and your dead.
There, get him! Come on, get him! Kill him, KILL HIM! Let's see how cool he is now.
[after a wire sprays sparks and scares the kids]

[laughs]
It's just a plug! It's just a plug.
Yeah, you jumped back too.
Bugs and drugs. Bugs and drugs. Smooth operation, that's what I got. Smooth operation.
